      • generateWallet

        public Wallet generateWallet​(Currency currency,
                             boolean testnet,
                             String mnemonic)
                      throws Exception
        Generate wallet
        Parameters:
        currency - blockchain to generate wallet for
        testnet - testnet or mainnet version of address
        mnemonic - mnemonic seed to use. If not present, new one will be generated
        Returns:
        the wallet
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception
